active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a small group, debate the trade-offs of application whitelisting versus blacklisting in a resource-constrained small business environment. Consider factors like false positives, management overhead, and malware evasion techniques. Cite evidence from CIS Controls and NIST frameworks to support your position.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
